casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Daniel A. YOUNG, Sr. No. 503P00-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Robert Montgomeiy, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of December 2007 by Defendant for Writ to Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
